seriously?\""},{"lineNumber":60039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「壊されたーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's broken—!"},{"lineNumber":60040,"originalJapaneseLine":"　チューリップ壊されちゃったよーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The turret's been uh-oh.\""},{"lineNumber":60043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし……マリア、お代わりだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright... It'll get destroyed again!\""},{"lineNumber":60049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出さなきゃ代わりに俺たちが消し炭だろうが、アホ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If we don't send it out, we'll end up as charcoal instead, idiot!"},{"lineNumber":60050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいから出せ、命令だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just send it out, it's an order!\""},{"lineNumber":60051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ううっ……ごめんね、3号……しくしく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... I'm sorry, Unit 3... sob sob...\""},{"lineNumber":60052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッ、邪魔者は黙ったか。後は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, the nuisance is quiet now. Next...\""},{"lineNumber":60053,"originalJapaneseLine":"遠方から、同じく避雷針を付けた戦車が、","translatedEnglishLine":"From afar, another tank equipped with a lightning rod"},{"lineNumber":60054,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイの前に姿を現した。","translatedEnglishLine":"appeared before Rei."},{"lineNumber":60055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「備えは充分、ってかよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Prepared enough, huh..."},{"lineNumber":60056,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいぜェ――――――全て砕く！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Fine then――――I'll crush them all!\""},{"lineNumber":60057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「させるか！　いい加減くたばれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not if I can help it! Just die already!\""},{"lineNumber":60058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、あ、りゃああぁぁぁぁぁぁ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Dah, aryaaahhh!!\""},{"lineNumber":60059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……！　お、ぐおおおおおぉぉぁぁっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh...! O-ogooooahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":60060,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの渾身の一撃を叩きつけられ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Struck by Rance's all-out blow,"},{"lineNumber":60061,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイが膝をつく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei dropped to his knees."},{"lineNumber":60062,"originalJapaneseLine":"全身を巡る雷も途絶え衰え、","translatedEnglishLine":"The lightning coursing through his body faded and weakened,"},{"lineNumber":60063,"originalJapaneseLine":"既に行動不能であるかに見えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and he seemed already incapacitated."},{"lineNumber":60064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「が、はあぁぁっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah, haaaah...!"},{"lineNumber":60065,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はぁっ！　はぁっ！　はぁっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Haa! Haa! Haa...!\""},{"lineNumber":60066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うふわははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ufuhahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":60067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様大勝ーーーーー利！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am the great victor!!\""},{"lineNumber":60068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、っ……お、おおおおおっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-Oh... ooooooh...!"},{"lineNumber":60069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、まさか、あの怪物が……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"C-could it be that monster...!\""},{"lineNumber":60070,"originalJapaneseLine":"（凄まじいな……あれが、魔人と渡り合うという、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Incredible... that is the one said to stand against the Demon Lord,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一撃で人体程度、炭化させるほどの力が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A power capable of charring a human body with a single blow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスには小さな火傷程度にしか届いていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has only caused Rance a minor burn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （何か……何かに、雷が引き寄せられた……？）
「がはははは、雷は対策済だ！」
やってきた戦車の砲塔部分には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the turret of the incoming tank,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主砲の代わりに大型の避雷針が据え付けられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a large lightning rod was installed instead of the main cannon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もー、せっかくの戦車なのに、
こんなの付けさせるなんて……可愛くなーい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they make us put something like this on it... not cute at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「雷で好き勝手はもうできんぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can't mess around with lightning anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで、ただのケンカ自慢だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now it's just an empty brag."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう思うんなら、やってみやがれ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you think so, then go ahead and try...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 叩き潰してやるぜ、ランス！」
「ッ、お、らあああァァァァァァッ！！」
「きゃーーーーーーっ！？
チューリップがーーーーーっ！」
苛烈極まる勢いと共に、レイの手刀が戦車を引き裂く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With fierce momentum, Rei's hand blade tore through the tank.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前面装甲がひしゃげて、そのまま動かなくなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The front armor caved in and it stopped moving altogether.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げっ……マジか」
「壊されたーーー！
チューリップ壊されちゃったよーー！」
「ままま、まずいですよランスさん！
戦車が壊れると、雷が……あわわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the tank breaks, the lightning will... uh-oh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし……マリア、お代わりだ！」
「あの避雷針、他の戦車にも付けてるだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That lightning rod is on the other tanks too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと次の戦車呼んでこい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurry up and call the next tank!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、えーーーーー！！
い、いやよ！　また壊されちゃうじゃない！」
「出さなきゃ代わりに俺たちが消し炭だろうが、アホ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we don't send it out, we'll end up as charcoal instead, idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいから出せ、命令だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just send it out, it's an order!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううっ……ごめんね、3号……しくしく……」
「ケッ、邪魔者は黙ったか。後は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, the nuisance is quiet now. Next..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠方から、同じく避雷針を付けた戦車が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From afar, another tank equipped with a lightning rod

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイの前に姿を現した。
「備えは充分、ってかよ……
いいぜェ――――――全て砕く！」
「させるか！　いい加減くたばれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not if I can help it! Just die already!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、あ、りゃああぁぁぁぁぁぁ！！」
「ぐっ……！　お、ぐおおおおおぉぉぁぁっ！」
ランスの渾身の一撃を叩きつけられ、
レイが膝をつく。
全身を巡る雷も途絶え衰え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The lightning coursing through his body faded and weakened,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に行動不能であるかに見えた。
「が、はあぁぁっ……！
はぁっ！　はぁっ！　はぁっ……！」
「うふわははははははは！
俺様大勝ーーーーー利！！」
「お、っ……お、おおおおおっ……！
ま、まさか、あの怪物が……！」
（凄まじいな……あれが、魔人と渡り合うという、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Incredible... that is the one said to stand against the Demon Lord,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, the nuisance is quiet now. Next..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From afar, another tank equipped with a lightning rod

いいぜェ――――――全て砕く！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The lightning coursing through his body faded and weakened,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に行動不能であるかに見えた。
